{{title|operator{{==}}{{petty|(std::copyable_function)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/copyable_function/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|1=
friend bool operator==( const std::copyable_function&amp; f, std::nullptr_t ) noexcept;
}}

Checks whether the wrapper {{c|f}} has a callable target by formally comparing it with {{lc|std::nullptr_t}}. Empty wrappers (that is, wrappers without a target) compare equal, non-empty functions compare non-equal.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::copyable_function&lt;FunctionType&gt;}}}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
